titleStmt.title: These are to give you notice, that by vertue of an ordinance of the 27 of October last, you are assessed to lend the summe of [blank] of lawfull English money, to bee paid for our brethren of Scotland for their assisting up in this warre
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
